alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 4:39PM MST until July 30 at 5:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 530 PM MST. * At 439 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Chui-Chu, or 9 miles southwest of Casa Grande, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Casa Grande and Stanfield. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 152 and 175. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 161 and 166. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
